name: GP Display Child Categories
author: Giang Peter

sections.description:
GP Display Child Categories help you create a Widget custom to display on Sidebar or a area Widget.

Major features in GP Display Child Categories include:

  • Select a parent category for diplay all child category of them.
  • Display the Widget to your Sidebar or a area Widget another.

PS: If you have any question. You can send it to me follow as my email: giangmd93@gmail.com
sections.installation:
Upload the GP Display Child Categories plugin to your blog, Activate it, then you go to Admin’s main Menu: Appearance/Widgets to page have all widget.

Move the GP Display Child Categories Widget to Area your Widget then select category. Done!
